answerText: Les Misérables [or The Wretched; or The Miserable Ones] [10] This Frenchman wrote The Hunchback of Notre Dame and Les Misérables.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Bishop Myriel lies, telling the police that a man did not steal his silverware. [10] Name this novel in which Cosette, the Thénardiers, and Jean Valjean appear.
